title: Gwen Stefani wears eccentric outfit to football game with three sons
text:
Gwen Stefani was giving a nod to her beau Blake Shelton on Sunday.

The Voice star was wear a cap that said OKIE, which is a person who hails from Oklahoma. Shelton was born and raised in Oklahomo and has a ranch there.

The 50-year-old siren was a football game where her son Kingston, 13, played. Her two other children Apollo, 11, and Zuma, aged five, looked on.

Family time: Gwen Stefani stepped out to watch her son Kingston play in a football game with her other two children Apollo, and Zuma

The family arrived ready to snack on some popcorn as she watched her oldest son score a touchdown that won the team their game.

For her look of the day, the No Doubt alum wore a long sleeve tie dye button-up that had orange, black, and brown coloring.

She wore a pair of gray leggings and had on a pair of yellow cowgirl boots that went up to where her leggings cropped.

On her shoulder, she carried an Off-White bag that had the signature yellow strap.

Street style: She wore a pair of gray leggings and had on a pair of yellow cowgirl boots that went up to where her leggings cropped

During the game, the singer settled in next to her parents as they watched Kingston in the game.

Gwen munched on some popcorn and sipped on a sparkling water as Kingston scored a touchdown at the end of the game that helped his team defeat the other.

And while it seemed like a family fun day, her longtime boyfriend Blake Shelton appeared to be nowhere in sight.

Football fans: During the game, the singer settled in next to her parents as they watched Kingston in the game

The Hollaback Girl singer shares her three children with her ex-husband Gavin Rossdale.

The couple was together for nearly 20 years and married for 13 and still remain close to co-parent their children together.

Stefani met the country singer back when she was brought onto his show The Voice back in 2014 and began to date just a year later after both getting divorced around the same time.
description: It's game day for this family. On Sunday, Gwen Stefani, 50, stepped out to watch her son Kingston, 13, play in a football game with her other two children Apollo, 11, and Zuma, aged five.
